column4: is there a way I can get a list of TTYs and switch from one to another through the command line?
setserial, but you'll have to fetch it.
thanks, i'll fetch it, check it out and read the man page - this will allow me to list or switch TTYs, or both?
I'm a little confused I'm currently on /dev/pts/1 - how do I jump onto another TTY, this don't seem to work > setserial /dev/pts/0
go pack to setserial, and select another comm, port. But I don't think setserial will play with a pts port?
well I wanted to know what TTW was being used by a shell so i typed in the command "tty"
I wat to switch from one open shell terminal to another open shell terminal
ttw? are you playing on a test box or mission critical box?
so how can I switch between each terminal on a machine to see what is going on inside it?
wow, you totally misunderstand what i'm trying to do
